cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format like '999.999.999.999' will cause network connection failures and prevent proper AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink carrier bandwidth to 1000 PRBs exceeds the maximum allowed bandwidth for the frequency band and may cause configuration errors or hardware incompatibility.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行載波頻寬設定為 1000 PRB 超過頻帶允許的最大頻寬，可能導致配置錯誤或硬體不相容。
